```{r, echo=F}
library(tidyverse)
library(magrittr)
library(deSolve)
library(here)
```

![compartmental diagram](concept.png)

Equations

$$
\begin{aligned}
 \frac{dS}{dt} &= -\beta S I_k - \beta S I_u - \phi \gamma - (1-\phi) \gamma (S/U) \\ \\
 \frac{dE}{dt} &=  \beta S I_k + \beta S I_u - \psi \theta E - (1-\psi) \theta E - (1-\phi) \gamma (E/U) \\ \\
 \frac{dI_k}{dt} &= \psi \theta E - \alpha I_k \\ \\
 \frac{dI_u}{dt} &= (1-\psi) \theta E - \alpha I_u - (1-\phi) \gamma (Iu/U) \\ \\
 \frac{dR_k}{dt} &= \alpha I_k \\ \\
 \frac{dR_u}{dt} &= \alpha I_u - (1-\phi) \gamma (Ru/U) \\ \\
 \frac{dV}{dt} &= \gamma \\ \\
\end{aligned}
$$
Parameters

$$
\begin{align*}
 & U = unknown\ immunity\ status\\ \\
 & \beta = transmission\ rate\\ \\ 
 & \phi = probability\ seropositive\\ \\ 
 & \alpha = recovery\ rate\\ \\
 & \epsilon = antibody\ testing\ rate\\ \\
 & \upsilon = vaccination\ rate\\ \\
 & \psi = probability\ infected\\ \\
\end{align*}
$$

ODE
Define functions and variables for deSolve
```{r}
e<-function(t,x,params){
  S <- x[1]
  E <- x[2]
  Ik <- x[3]
  Iu <- x[4]
  Rk <- x[5]
  Ru <- x[6]
  V <- x[7]
  with(as.list(params),{
    dS <- -beta*S*Ik - beta*S*Iu - phi*gamma - (1-phi)*gamma*(S/(S+E+Iu+Ru))
    dE <- beta*S*Ik + beta*S*Iu - psi*theta*E - (1-psi)*theta*E - (1-phi)*gamma*(E/(S+E+Iu+Ru))
    dIk <- psi*theta*E - alpha*Ik
    dIu <- (1-psi)*theta*E - alpha*Iu - (1-phi)*gamma*(Iu/(S+E+Iu+Ru))
    dRk <- alpha*Ik
    dRu <- alpha*Iu - (1-phi)*gamma*(Ru/(S+E+Iu+Ru))
    dV <- gamma
    res<-c(dS,dE,dIk,dIu,dRk,dRu,dV)
    list(res)
  })}
maxTime <- 100.0 # time
times<-seq(0,maxTime,by=0.1) # how often this calculates
# notes on params
# beta =      <- contact transmission rate
# phi =       <- range:0-1 proportion vaccines targeted to known susceptible individuals
# psi =       <- range: 0-1 probability infected individuals are identified
# alpha =     <- recovery rate
# gamma =     <- number of daily vaccines

params<-c(beta=0.000003,
          phi=1,
          psi=0.3,
          theta=1/5,
          alpha=1/7,
          gamma=10000)  # model parameters

R0 <-(params[1]/params[3]) #calculate R0 with current parameters

xstart<-c(S=500000,
          E=2500,
          Ik=2500,
          Iu=5000,
          Rk=10000,
          Ru=30000,
          V=0)  # initial conditions
```

simulation with antibody assistance
```{r}
params<-c(beta=0.000003,
          phi=1,
          psi=0.3,
          theta=1/5,
          alpha=1/7,
          gamma=10000)  # model parameters


R0 <-(params[1]/params[3]) #calculate R0 with current parameters

output<-as.data.frame(lsoda(xstart,times,de,params)) # tells computer to solve (integrate) equations
output$X <- output$Rk + output$V
output$HI_threshold <- (1-1/R0)*xstart[1] #add in herd immunity threshold
output %>% ggplot(.,aes(x=time))+
  geom_line(aes(y=S,col="Susceptible"))+
  geom_line(aes(y=E,col="Exposed"))+
  geom_line(aes(y=Ik,col="Infected_k"))+
  geom_line(aes(y=Iu,col="Infected_u"))+
  geom_line(aes(y=Rk,col="Recovered_k"))+
  geom_line(aes(y=Ru,col="Recovered_u"))+
  geom_line(aes(y=V,col="Vaccinated"))+
  geom_line(aes(y=X,col="X"))+
  scale_colour_manual(values = c("red","orange","hotpink","green","blue","purple","gray","black"))+
  theme(legend.position = c(0.75,0.4))+
  labs(y="N",x="Time",col="Population")+
  ggtitle("Transmission Model for Antibody-Assisted Vaccinations")+
  theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust=, size=10))+
  geom_hline(yintercept=2*10^5)+
  xlim(0,20)+ylim(0,500000)
```

when phi = 0, vaccinations are distributed to anyone who is not known to be recovered or infectious. 
```{r}
params<-c(beta=0.000003,
          phi=0,
          psi=0.3,
          theta=1/5,
          alpha=1/7,
          gamma=10000)  # model parameters

output<-as.data.frame(lsoda(xstart,times,de,params)) # tells computer to solve (integrate) equations
output$X <- output$Rk + output$V
output$HI_threshold <- (1-1/R0)*xstart[1] #add in herd immunity threshold
output %>% ggplot(.,aes(x=time))+
  geom_line(aes(y=S,col="Susceptible"))+
  geom_line(aes(y=E,col="Exposed"))+
  geom_line(aes(y=Ik,col="Infected_k"))+
  geom_line(aes(y=Iu,col="Infected_u"))+
  geom_line(aes(y=Rk,col="Recovered_k"))+
  geom_line(aes(y=Ru,col="Recovered_u"))+
  geom_line(aes(y=V,col="Vaccinated"))+
  geom_line(aes(y=X,col="X"))+
  scale_colour_manual(values = c("red","orange","hotpink","green","blue","purple","gray","black"))+
  theme(legend.position = c(0.75,0.4))+
  labs(y="N",x="Time",col="Population")+
  ggtitle("Transmission Model for Antibody-Assisted Vaccinations")+
  theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust=, size=10))+
  geom_hline(yintercept=2*10^5)+
  xlim(0,20)+ylim(0,500000)
```
